column1: Table 4: Number of State and Federal inmates held in local jails and percent of all prisoners under jurisdiction, 2000-2006
Author(s): William J. Sabol, Heather Couture, and Paige M. Harrison
Table 4. Number of State and Federal inmates held in local jails and percent of all prisoners under jurisdiction, 2000-2006.
Note: See Appendix table 4 for State-level data.
*Percent is total number in local jails over the total number of prisoners under jurisdiction of State or Federal authorities.
